welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kobayashi, Japan! This charming city is known for its beautiful natural surroundings and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Kobayashi has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kagoshima Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Kagoshima Airport serves flights to and from other countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Miyazaki Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights operated by low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration.
